Articles.Content:
Me and Tobmaster (and maybe Australianfries) will be doing a livestream. It will be me piloting a rocket to the Mun and (hopefully) back again. The twist is that I'm in IVA mode only, and the others will be giving me stats about when to burn, how long to burn and so on. We will be using the telemachus mod by Rich to give stats.

We've did this earlier (two weeks ago), and Tobmaster made a thread which can be seen here.

Oh yes, you can watch it here when it starts, which it will do at 8pm GMT+2 (in 40 minutes from now).

(In case the twitch.tv link doesn't work, sorry, it's my first time streaming )
